page.title: 01LANDSCAPE AND BUILDINGS
page.content: {Potton}is a small country town in {Bedfordshire}situated about nineteen miles from{Cambridge}and twelve miles from Bedford. It is not a busy place. There are about{four thousand inhabitants, including one Chinese family and a small group of gypsies. There are{few businesses}in Potton, {many people commuting}to larger towns. Potton is a friendy community with many clubs and societies including{Potton Barbershop, } one small football team and three playgroups. There is a{Market Square} in Potton at the centre of which is an historically interesting{Clock House. Around the market square there are mainly shops but there is also a Lloyds bank and a hotel. The area round the market square has been modernized in keeping with its character.
